name: Raccoon Gardners
description:
A competitive 1v1 or 2v2 game. First team to win by growing trees and if its tie, it goes to sudden death!

Programmers - Rasmus Löfgren, Fabian Larsson & Eero Mutka
Character Design - Rong Kun Sun
Environment Design & Tools - Linnea Hallenbom
SFX - Shervin Abasahl

 You can use a PS4 controller or keyboard Keyboard Controls WASD - Move player around field X - Throw Item Z - Pick up/Use Item (e.g. Dig, Plant, Spray depending on tool) X - Space PS4 Controllers Left Thumbstick - Move player around field Triangle - Throw Item Square - Pick up/Use Item (e.g. Dig, Plant, Spray depending on tool) X - Dash
